name: tint.
description:
Tint lets you solve puzzles by painting. Mix watercolors to match the color of the origami - all at a soothing pace and in the comfort of your own garden studio. Here are no timers, no countdowns, no points and certainly no rush, whenever you feel like a break.

220 LEVELS AND COUNTING

Each level can often be solved in multiple ways, feel free to try a stroke of genius. More levels and challenges will continuously be added at no extra cost. Enable notifications and we will let you know when more are available.

NATURE SOOTHES YOU

Nature is all around you when playing ‘tint’. Play on a warm summer morning or a light drizzle of rain - with every chapter the weather will change around you.

HEAR THE BIRDS

Your headphones lets you get the full binaural audio experience. Every sound has been carefully crafted by hand using real objects found in nature and in an art studio.

COLORBLIND & VISION IMPAIRED MODE

Each color has its own unique tune, and if you are colorblind or vision impaired, you can enable a special mode in the menu that will help you better see the color differences with unique patterns on each color.

NO IN-APP PURCHASES, ADS OR TRACKING

That’s it. We simply want you to enjoy the game we created for the Apple Arcade. To protect your privacy no information is collected and we will never try to sell you anything at any point during the game, promise.

A perfect mix of passion, sweat and tears has gone into this game, we hope you like it!

<3

Mika, Tomek & Jakob
